sub_topic: Probability of a certain outcome in a sports game
message_1: In the Super Bowl, the probability of the Kansas City Chiefs beating the San Francisco 49ers is 0.6. If John bets on the Kansas City Chiefs to win, what is the probability that he will win his bet?
message_2: The probability that John will win his bet is the same as the probability of the Kansas City Chiefs beating the San Francisco 49ers, which is 0.6.
